definition: to rock/to sway/to flicker (e.g. of lights reflected on water)/to flutter (e.g. of a flag)/to trick sb into doing sth/to dupe/to con
to neglect one's duty/dereliction of duty/malpractice
now hot, now cold/(of one's mood, affection etc) to alternate
now hot, now cold/(of one's mood, affection etc) to alternate
to drift without a resting place (idiom)/roving/errant/vagrant/erratic
Khubilai Khan (1215-1294), grandson of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗, first Yuan dynasty emperor, reigned 1260-1294

sentences.english: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Naphtali, Pedahel the son of Ammihud.
sentences.chinese: 拿弗他利支派有一個首領，亞米忽的兒子比大黑。

sentences.english: Pass, such as when pretending to casually looked elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 等擦肩而過時，忽又裝作漫不經心地打量着別處。

sentences.english: Shemuel son of Ammihud, from the tribe of Simeon;
sentences.chinese: 西緬支派有亞米忽的兒子示母利。

sentences.english: When he got to the airport, he hurried to meet his girl friend.
sentences.chinese: 當他到達機場時，他忽忙去會見自己的女友了。

sentences.english: A sudden splash of water frightened the old man.
sentences.chinese: 忽聽嘩啦一聲水響，老頭兒嚇了一大跳。

sentences.english: The bell died in thepatter of rain, from hell came the laughing of Satan at my brain.
sentences.chinese: 然鐘聲忽止於急雨兮，但聞撒旦之歡聲笑語。

sentences.english: Genuine racial equality still seems away.
sentences.chinese: 真正蹬種族平等似忽仍遙遙無欺。

sentences.english: And of the tribe of the children of Simeon , Shemuel the son of Ammihud.
sentences.chinese: 西緬子孫的支派有亞米忽的兒子示母利。

sentences.english: Absalom fled and went to Talmai son of Ammihud, the king of Geshur.
sentences.chinese: 押沙龍逃到基述王亞米忽的兒子達買那裏去了。

sentences.english: Sometimes hurriedly, the peach blossom rotates with water in March.
sentences.chinese: 忽匆匆，三月桃花隨水轉。

sentences.english: While her father spoke, there was a knock at the door.
sentences.chinese: 就在她父親說話的時候，忽聽有人敲門。

sentences.english: Suddenly a bombard sounded and the flags parted. Archers and crossbowmen fired simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 忽聽得一聲炮響，紅旗開處，弓弩齊發。

sentences.english: But Absalom fled, and went to Talmai, the son of Ammihud, king of Geshur.
sentences.chinese: 押沙龍逃到基述王亞米忽的兒子達買那裏去了。

sentences.english: A road. Flowers lure me, rocks ease me. Day suddenly ends.
sentences.chinese: 千巖萬壑路不定，迷花倚石忽已暝。

definition: to hear suddenly/to learn of sth unexpectedly
to wait a moment/do not go too soon
the very moment/just then/during (that brief interval)
